Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Looking Glass v0.1.0 foundation

Phase 0 implementation of the Looking Glass programmable chat UI:

- Monorepo setup with Turborepo + pnpm
- @looking-glass/core: MCP server, Zustand state, event bus, transports
- @looking-glass/shell: Header, Footer, Sidebar, TabBar components
- @looking-glass/chat: Message rendering, input, streaming support
- Alice Demo app with terminal aesthetic theme
- Terminal theme: green-on-black, JetBrains Mono, box-drawing chars

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

- Create developer guide with setup, patterns, and best practices
- Add API reference for core, shell, and chat packages

- Add MCP Controllable UI specification

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
